item.title: Sergio Gor sworn in as U.S. ambassador to India
item.description: Sergio Gor was sworn in Monday as the U.S. ambassador to India and special envoy to South and Central Asia.

item.title: N.Y. Gov. Kathy Hochul puts the brakes on Mamdani's free bus-ride plan
item.description: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul has panned a key policy proposal from New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani.
